trans-unit.resname: EXO·1 | Allay | Card Name
EXO·1 | Allay | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: EXO·1 | Allay | Card Text | Paragraph 2
EXO·3 | Cataclysm | Card Name
EXO·3 | Cataclysm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player chooses from among the permanents they control an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.
trans-unit.target: 每个玩家从自己所操控的永久物中选择一个神器，一个生物，一个结界，以及一张地，并且牺牲其余的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·5 | Convalescence | Card Name
EXO·5 | Convalescence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 10 or less life, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，如果你的生命在10点或以下，获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·6 | Exalted Dragon | Card Name
EXO·6 | Exalted Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
EXO·6 | Exalted Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't attack unless you sacrifice a land. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
trans-unit.target: 每回合，除非你牺牲一张地，否则CARDNAME不可攻击。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·7 | High Ground | Card Name
EXO·7 | High Ground | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control can block an additional creature each combat.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的每个生物可以额外多阻挡一个生物。

EXO·8 | Keeper of the Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: oW，ocT：获得3点生命。你只能在生命较目标对手少时使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·9 | Kor Chant | Card Name
EXO·9 | Kor Chant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个来源。于本回合中，该来源将对目标由你操控的生物造成之所有伤害，改为对另一个目标生物造成之。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·10 | Limited Resources | Card Name
EXO·10 | Limited Resources | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player chooses five lands they control and sacrifices the rest.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，每个玩家选择五张他所操控的地，并且牺牲其余的地。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·10 | Limited Resources | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Players can't play lands as long as ten or more lands are on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 只要场上有十张或更多的地，玩家们不可使用地。

trans-unit.resname: EXO·11 | Oath of Lieges | Card Name
EXO·11 | Oath of Lieges | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more lands than they do and is their opponent. The first player may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在每个玩家的维持阶段中，若该玩家所操控的地较目标对手少，该玩家可以自他的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将其放置进场。该玩家之后将他的牌库洗牌。

EXO·12 | Paladin en-Vec | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: EXO·61 | Entropic Specter | Card Name
EXO·61 | Entropic Specter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flying
As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's hand.
Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

trans-unit.resname: EXO·131 | Coat of Arms | Card Name
EXO·131 | Coat of Arms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，战场上每有一个与它具共通生物类别的其他生物，它便得+1/+1。（举例来说，有两个吸血鬼／僧侣和一个人类／僧侣的话，便会各得+2/+2）
